    • Constructor Detail

      • Product

        public Product(java.lang.String name,
       java.lang.String producerName,
       double price)
        Creates a new product with specified name, producer name and price. A product ID will also be generated automatically
        Parameters:
        name - - Product name
        producerName - - Producer name
        price - - product price in $ Price can be fractional (ex. 0.99$)
